description: This module handles some common Riak operations

target_node.description: The target node for certain operations (join, ping)

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.

wait_for_service.description: Waits for a riak service to come online before continuing.

http_conn.description: The ip address and port that is listening for Riak HTTP queries

wait_for_ring.description: Number of seconds to wait for all nodes to agree on the ring.

wait_for_handoffs.description: Number of seconds to wait for handoffs to complete.

command.description: The command you would like to perform against the cluster.

config_dir.description: The path to the riak configuration directory
